Name: The Last City
About the game: Can your Colony survive 10 days or more in the desert? Find food, build your colony, recruit new workers, feed your population, craft tools and equipment, cook food and research technologies! Features: -Player controls (mouse and keyboard). -Building and Crafting -Resource gathering -Inventory system -Selection system -Automated colonist work schedules -Equipment -Character attributes (health, hunger, happiness...) -Attacking and HP -Factories for item production. -Resources regeneration -Tech Tree -Event system -Game clock, day/night cycle -Save/Load system
Meta Title: The Last City: Jun 4, 2022, Lentuio and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The Last City? Check out the release date (Jun 4, 2022), developer insights from Lentuio, and a complete game summary.
